Posts.Content: Lot12 wrote: hi ladies Hope someone can help ease my anxiety Had my annual obgyn visit june 1 everything else was fine except that my doctor found what she said was a suspicious lump on my right breast 10oclock she said its 1x1cm She let me feel it but was already panicking when she said the word suspicious And i forgot to ask her the characteristic of the node she sent me for a breast ultrasound which i have an appointment june 9 When i try to feel the lump i think its movable and flat I didnt have any pain but when i knew that something is there i started feeling tingiling sensation Im 30 years old with 3kids im si scared of having BC Does my lump sound like a cancerouse lump? What do doctors mean when they say suspicious lump I dont have any other symptoms Thank you in advance for your help God bless Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Suspicious right breast lump Lot12 Moderators
